mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD" WHERE BOARD_CODE = 3 AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY BOARD_NO ASC) "RNUM", BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NICKNAME, (SELECT PRICE FROM FLEA_BOARD F WHERE F.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS PRICE, (SELECT GOODS FROM FLEA_BOARD F WHERE F.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS GOODS,
CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((CURRENT_DATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN CURRENT_DATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((CURRENT_DATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전'
WHEN CURRENT_DATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((CURRENT_DATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END AS "BOARD_WRITE_DATE"
, (SELECT IMG_PATH || IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE IMG_ORDER = 0 AND I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO ) AS THUMBNAIL FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = 3 ORDER BY RNUM DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD"
JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO)
JOIN FLEA_BOARD USING(BOARD_NO)
WHERE BOARD_CODE = 3 AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND ( BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' )
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND GOODS LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_CODE, READ_COUNT, B.MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(BOARD_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') AS BOARD_UPDATE_DATE,
( SELECT IMG_PATH || IMG_RENAME FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND IMG_ORDER = 0 ) AS THUMBNAIL, (SELECT PRICE FROM FLEA_BOARD F WHERE F.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS PRICE, (SELECT GOODS FROM FLEA_BOARD F WHERE F.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) AS GOODS,
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND BOARD_CODE = 3
SELECT * FROM BOARD_IMG WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY IMG_ORDER ASC

SELECT CEIL(RNUM/#{limit}) CP FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) RNUM, BOARD_NO FROM "BOARD"
JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO)
JOIN FLEA_BOARD USING(BOARD_NO)
WHERE BOARD_CODE = 3 AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND ( BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' )
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
